titles.title: Maumee Valley National Heritage Area Act
To establish the Maumee Valley National Heritage Area in Ohio and Indiana, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 7/30/2010--Introduced. Maumee Valley National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Maumee Valley National Heritage Area in Indiana and Ohio. Designates the Maumee Valley Heritage Corridor, Inc. as the local coordinating entity for the Heritage Area. Requires the Maumee Valley Heritage Corridor to prepare and submit a management plan for the Heritage Area. Prohibits the Maumee Valley Heritage Corridor from using federal funds received under this Act for the acquisition of real property. Sets forth requirements for the approval or disapproval of the management plan.
